author: Curtis Ide
releaseNotes:
Version 1.0.2 Changes:
- Added pattern attribute (enum) for rule engine compatibility
- Added onAndApplyPattern() command for rule engines (turn on and apply pattern in one action)
- Added Actuator capability for better rule engine integration
- Enhanced Credits section with protocol documentation clarification

Version 1.0.1 Changes:
- Added Hubitat Package Manager repository.json for easy installation

Version 1.0.0 - First Official Release:
- Complete Hubitat integration for Oelo Lights controllers
- Multi-zone support (up to 6 zones)
- Pattern capture and management (up to 200 patterns)
- Automatic controller discovery with IP auto-configuration
- Spotlight plan customization
- Pattern validation and verification
- Auto-polling and command verification
- Full pattern rename/delete functionality
- Stable pattern IDs with RGB color identification
